info.author: Du Wenshan
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
BAOW is a lightweight content manage system based on python language and SQL 
database, help you to develop complex web applications. 
Highlights: 
 
 * BBS or forum system, like phpBB. 
 * Documents manage. 
 * News manage. 
 * Private messages. 
 * with some Wiki or Blog features. 
 * use MoinMoin Wiki marks to edit your contents 
 * Unicode (utf-8) support 
 * International support 
 * built in HTML widget, like GTK 
 * easy to extend and maintain. 
 * user manage and role check and manage.
info.keywords: baow cms bbs forum cherrypy sqlobject mysql html chinese
info.name: BAOW
info.summary: BAOW is a lightweight content manage system.
